label: General
specifications: We will file permits with the town immediately upon receiving the signed proposal, capital improvement form, deposit, or financing approval.
All old equipment and debris will be removed from the property.
(1) Year Robison Gold Service Contract ($550.00 Value) FREE (customer must purchase oil from Robison for free contract)
Permit and application fees are included in proposal pricing

label: Boilers
specifications: Energy Kinetics - Lifetime Heat Exchanger warranty (customer must register product within 60 days of installation)
Installation includes a complimentary inspection and cleaning of the home heating chimney by Guaranteed Home Improvement - per National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) 211 to ensure safe venting.
